about_the_game:
A True Homage to Classic Beat 'em Up Genre and Titles.

School Beat is an amalgam of Beat 'em Up game with Action, Adventure, and Roguelite genres that brings an action-packed tension to you and serves as the homage to classic Beat 'em Up titles like Double Dragon Series, and Kunio-kun (River City) Series.

Beat all delinquent, be at the top chain!

Be the school delinquent that will beat and conquer all and each delinquents in the town! Rule them all and stand at the top rank by beating everyone that sits on their juvenile throne!

Face all The Delinquent Bosses with Fist!

Defeat all Delinquent Bosses and grab their rank in your victory with your hand and prove your might steadily raise at the top!

Taste The Upgrade, Taste The Victory!

Upgrade your character in each of your fighting journey by going to the vending machines dispersed around the town, spend all of those kaching you got from your fights, taste all the food and drink, feel the upgrade in your body, and taste the sweet victory of your fights.

Watch Out for The Juggernaut!

The archenemy of every delinquents at the town, "Super Badass Teacher", will keep the law and order of the town and the school from juveniles wandering around and might sweep you out along the way. So be careful of him!
